document_data.name: Glassee
document_data.mainbody: '''Glassee''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that make other material as transparent as glass.<ref name=PHB2.R-p225">
document_data.Effects: This spell temporarily made a portion of flat material as transparent as glass to the caster's gaze. This spell only worked on wood, stone, [[iron]], or [[steel]]. The transparent area measured {{SI|3|ft|long=yes}} by {{SI|2|ft|long=yes}} and the caster could make it fully transparent or so only they could see through.<ref name=PHB2.R-p225"/>
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] a small piece of [[glass]] or crystal to cast.<ref name=PHB2.R-p225"/>
document_data.History: [[Zrie Prakis]], a [[lich]] from [[Westgate]], used this spell.
